|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |nqam = |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = Bluetooth 4.0 Chip;Broadcom;BCM20702;;1; ,,, 802.11ac Dual Band WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SE5516A;;2; |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/16/2014 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIADRW5R89196 |asin = B01D14PEAW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The antenna connector shown and specified in the FCC test report is ''IPEX A13''. {{FCC ST|11/11/2014|indexme.}} {{See also|AzureWave Wireless Adapters|Bluetooth devices#AzureWave}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60603-6#188 On '''iXBT'''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM4360KML1G - 801.11ac 3T3R PCIe (14e4:43a0) :[[Broadcom]] BCM20702 - Bluetooth 4.0 USB (0b05:180a) :USB\VID_0B05&PID_180A&REV_0112 (BCM20702A0) :[[AzureWave AW-CB160H]] V03 Combo Module [13d3:3413] :[[Broadcom]] BCM4360 + BCM20702A1 (Bluetooth USB Module) :[http://www.wellshow.com/rf-connectors/mini-connector/ipex-mhf4-connector/ IPEX MHF4] *[https://applelife.ru/threads/broadcom-bcm943225hmb-kombo-modul-wi-fi-bt-formata-mini-pci-express.40663/page-12#post-499739 On '''AppleLife'''] :• '''ASUS X99 Deluxe''' motherboard :• '''ASUS RAMPAGE V Extreme''' motherboard - [http://www.3dnews.ru/909960 3DNews] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1247-azurewave-aw-cb160h-bcm94360hmb-1300mbps/?page=7 On '''OpenITforum'''] ==Notes== ===Drivers=== {{SCollapse|NTamd64.6.1 |
